title: An elegant and lively description of spirituall life and death Delivered in divers sermons in Lincolnes-Inne, November the 9.th, M.DCXXIII. vpon Iohn, 5.25. By Iohn Preston then Bachellor of Divinitie, and chaplaine in ordinarie to the Prince his Highnesse.
author: Preston, John, 1587-1628.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Tho: Cotes, for Michaell Sparke, at the blue Bible in Greene-Arbor,
